metadata.title: USN-2576-1 -- usb-creator vulnerability
metadata.description: Tavis Ormandy discovered that usb-creator was missing an authentication check. A local attacker could use this issue to gain elevated privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2576-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  usb-creator-gtk - 0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1 usb-creator-kde - 0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1 usb-creator-common - 0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
